properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 14 at 8:58AM CST by NWS Jackson MS
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a Flood Warning
for the following rivers in Louisiana...

Boeuf River Near Fort Necessity affecting Franklin Parish

The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a

* Flood Warning for
The Boeuf River Near Fort Necessity
* from Wednesday morning until further notice.
* At  8:00 AM Tuesday the stage was 48.1 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Flood stage is 50.0 feet.
* Forecast...The river will rise above flood stage tomorrow morning
and will continue to rise to near 53.0 feet early Friday morning.
* Flood history...This crest compares to a previous crest of 53.3 feet
on Jun 6 2009.
* Impact...At 50.0 feet...Widespread flooding of farm and agricultural
land is occurring along and near the river.
properties.instruction:
Do not drive or walk through areas where water covers roadway! The
water may be deeper than it appears. Remember...Turn around, don't
drown!

Please note that forecast crests are based upon rainfall that has
occurred along with forecast rainfall for the next 24 hours.

Additional information is available at:
https://water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN

The next regularly scheduled update is expected tonight between 8 and
10 PM.
